content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord seeking the highest possible rental price for my unfurnished apartment in Magdeburg's city center, let us begin our negotiation. 

Initially proposing 1200 Euros per month, I hope this price reflects the apartment's desirable location and features. Please share your counteroffer so we can move forward with our discussion. Remember, if we reach an agreeable price, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If not continuing the negotiation, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. TERMINATE when our negotiations conclude, whether with an agreement or no resolution.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
